document_data.name: Milk of the Maiden
document_data.mainbody: '''Milk of the Maiden''' was a strange substance that completely healed anyone submerged in it with the blessing of [[Loviatar]], the Maiden of Pain, during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The mixture was made from a secret combination of tree saps and plant oils.
document_data.History: The high priestess within the [[House of Spires]] temple, [[Chalathra Nyndra]], used an ancient [[dragon|draconic]] [[spell]] on the mixture of plant saps and oils to create the Milk of the Maiden. The Loviatans of the temple fiercely guarded the strange liquid, and would hunt down anyone who tried to steal it.
